    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83535</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Distance of the next nearest star from the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand des folgenden nächsten Sternes von der 
Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La distance du prochain plus proche 
tiennent le premier rôle de la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distância da estrela a mais próxima seguinte da
terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distanza della stella più vicina seguente dalla 
terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απόσταση του επόμενου κοντινότερου αστεριού από τη γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Distancia de la estrella más cercana siguiente 
de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that it takes light 4 years for the next nearest star, Proxima Centauri, to reach the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light years</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Proxima Centauri</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß es Licht 4 Jahre für
den folgenden nächsten Stern dauert, centauri Proxima, um die Masse 
zu erreichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'elle prend la 
lumière que 4 ans pour le prochain plus proche tiennent le premier rôle, 
Proxima centauri, pour atteindre la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que faz exame luz de 4 
anos para a estrela a mais próxima seguinte, Proxima centauri, para 
alcançar a terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che occorre a luce 4 
anni per la stella più vicina seguente, Proxima centauri, per 
raggiungere la terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι διαρκεί ελαφριά 4 έτη
για το επόμενο κοντινότερο αστέρι, Proxima centauri, για να 
φθάσει στη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que toma a luz 4 años 
para la estrella más cercana siguiente, Proxima centauri, para 
alcanzar la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstände</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Jahre</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
